com.moviestore.controller

Class HomeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.moviestore.controller.HomeController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/")
 @SessionAttributes(value={"userkey","moviekey","moviekeys","personRolesInMovieskey","genreskey","picture","pictures"})
public class HomeController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles requests for the application home page.
